sections.heading: Overview
content:
Kaela Austin is a licensed marriage, family, and child counselor who hosts
"Straight Talk with Kaela Austin," heard on KIEV Talk Radio 870 in the
Los Angeles area.

Austin is the former director of outpatient services for Charter Hospital in
Hermosa Beach, Calif., where she specialized in the treatment of patients
dealing with sexual and physical abuse, child abuse, and substance abuse. She
is the former supervisor of clinical group programming and the former marketing
coordinator of marriage, family, and child counselors for the Women's Program
at Pine Grove Hospital in Los Angeles. Austin is the former membership chair
for the Los Angeles chapter of the California Association of Marriage and
Family Therapists.
Austin has made many TV appearances and has been quoted widely.
